thumb.name: Pleased and Proud
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3ECongratulations. Donna Lesko.%3Cbr%3Eon This Happy Occasion%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EWe%26#146;re pleased and proud!%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EYour Colleagues%3Cbr%3Eand Management Team%3Cbr%3Eat Top-Nothch Tools%3Cbr%3E

thumb.name: You Reached Your Goal
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E Congratulations.%3Cbr%3E Alex! %3Cbr%3E You did it!%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EYou proved%3Cbr%3Ethat it's possible%3Cbr%3Eto overcome obstacles -%3Cbr%3Eeven when the odds%3Cbr%3Eseem to be against you.%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EYou proved that a person%3Cbr%3Ecan aim for a goal%3Cbr%3Ethat's a hard one to reach.%3Cbr%3Eand achieve it%3Cbr%3Ewith persistence.%3Cbr%3Ededication. and effort.%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3ECongratulations. Alex! You did It!%3Cbr%3EI know it wasn't easy.%3Cbr%3Ebut I'm not surprised at all.%3Cbr%3Ebecause I know you-%3Cbr%3Eand all along I knew%3Cbr%3Eyou had it in you to succeed.%3Cbr%3E

thumb.name: To the Nicest Person
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EIt couldn't%3Cbr%3Ehave happened%3Cbr%3Eto a nicer person!%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3ECongratulations. Kent!%3Cbr%3E

thumb.name: You Did It! Be Proud!
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3EYou%3Cbr%3Edid%3Cbr%3Eit.%3Cbr%3EEric!%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EC ool!%3Cbr%3EO utstanding!%3Cbr%3EN eat!%3Cbr%3EG reat!%3Cbr%3ER emarkable!%3Cbr%3EA mazing!%3Cbr%3ET errific!%3Cbr%3EU nbelievable!%3Cbr%3EL ovely!%3Cbr%3EA wesome!%3Cbr%3ET remendous!%3Cbr%3EI ncredible!%3Cbr%3EO utrageous!%3Cbr%3EN ice!%3Cbr%3ES weet!%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EYou should be proud!%3Cbr%3E

thumb.name: Hooray!
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3EGood goin'!%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3EHooray for you. Jane!

thumb.name: What Is Success?
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EJordan --%3Cbr%3EWhat Is Success?%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3ESETTING GOALS%3Cbr%3Ebut not in concrete%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3ESTAYING FOCUSED%3Cbr%3Ebut turning aside to help someone%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EFOLLOWING A PLAN%3Cbr%3Ebut remaining flexible%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EMOVING AHEAD%3Cbr%3Ebut not too fast to smell the flowers%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3ECLIMBING THE LADDER%3Cbr%3Ebut not stepping on toes%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EFIGHTING TO THE FINISH%3Cbr%3Ebut choosing your battles%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3ETAKING A BOW%3Cbr%3Ebut applauding those%3Cbr%3Ewho had a part in your success%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3ECongratulations%3Cbr%3Eon your success%3Cbr%3E
